menu_item.descript: 3 scrambled eggs mixed with fresh green scallion and ripe plum tomatoes; topped with bacon chunks and served over arepa paisa.
prime beef stewed in savory salsa criolla topped with two eggs. served with arepa points and greens
over-easy eggs cooked in copious olive oil infused with fresh kalamata olives; served with arepa points.
3 scrambled eggs, scallion, cilantro and marinated shrimp over arepa paisa.
toasty arepitas, colombian salchichón (salami) and poached eggs topped with our unique, homemade maracuyá (passion fruit) sauce.
queso blanco, tender corn kernel, 3-egg omelette tinted in exciting hues of red.
3 scrambled eggs, cheddar cheese, chorizo on focaccia.
